location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, Currently at Shiraz, to Captain James Jeakes, Commander of the Mornington

mods.abstract: Letter requests that James Jeakes await the arrival of Lieutenant Robert Taylor at Bushire before departing for India. William Bruce states that Taylor is on his way to Bushire with important dispatches from His Excellency Sir Gore Ouseley, British Ambassador to the Court of Persia, which are intended for the Supreme Government.
